name: Tory's Shop 'n' Rush
description: In the pursuit of profit, you can try a lot, so when the young Tory received a home appliance store from her uncle, giving up was stupid. And why refuse, when you can not only earn a decent amount, but also become part of a big deal! Too bad no one can promise instant success. Only a couple of days they will give you something to rub into confidence in the authorities, and then you have to act. Well, firstly, it's time to buy new products. Secondly, the store will not be prevented by updating the interior. Do it as quickly as possible, and there will be no end to customers. But you should not rejoice early: visitors can shake their nerves. In pursuit of profit, you will have to advise both the slow-witted old woman, and the demanding young customer, and the teenager versed in everything. The main thing is to sell the goods. And during breaks you can take a break and tidy up the room to compete even with eminent companies in all respects. Remember the thieves and do not let them leave the walls of the store with the booty. Each right step will bring income and funds for the new department. Show your competitors what a young girl is capable of In pursuit of profit! Business is a continuous competition, and only the most persistent can climb to the top. Feel the power of your business ideas, develop a strategy and follow the plan so that no competitor gets in your way and dreams of a huge electronics megamarket will come true. Find out what happens when excitement prevails over your mind!
